actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to establishing a no-fault system of motor vehicle insurance.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the 93rd Congress enact immediately a no-fault system of motor vehicle insurance.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to establishing a no-fault system of motor vehicle insurance.
